      • setBounds

        protected void setBounds()
        Sets the bounds of the frustum's BoundingBox. Should be called internally whenever a change to the frustum occurs.

      • getBoundingBox

        public BoundingBox getBoundingBox()
        Returns a BoundingBox representative of this frustum. This will create the BoundingBox if necessary.
        Returns:
        BoundingBox which contains this frustum.
